actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Military Nuclear Systems.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Procurement and Military Nuclear Systems

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the requirement that suggestions for methods to improve defense procurement policies be solicited from certain retiring officers of the Armed Forces and civilian employees of the Department of Defense.

summary.text: Repeals the requirement that suggestions for methods to improve defense procurement policies be solicited from certain retiring officers of the armed forces and civilian employees of the Department of Defense.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the requirement that suggestions for methods to improve defense procurement policies be solicited from certain retiring officers of the Armed Forces and civilian employees of the Department of Defense.
